meanings.definition: The cardinal number that is the sum of eight and one.
meanings.sent1: She counted up to nines on her fingers.
meanings.sent2: There were nines colorful balloons at the party.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that she needed nines pairs of eyes to watch all the students.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with nines of flowers, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The baker used nines eggs to make the cake extra fluffy.

meanings.definition: A set or combination of nine things.
meanings.sent1: He collected nines of his favorite trading cards.
meanings.sent2: The gift box contained nines of different chocolates.
meanings.sent3: The team had nines of players, making it hard to choose a starting lineup.
meanings.sent4: The treasure chest held nines of shiny jewels.
meanings.sent5: The store offered nines of flavors for the ice cream cone.

meanings.definition: Dressed to the nines (idiom: dressed very elegantly or formally).
meanings.sent1: She felt confident walking into the party dressed to the nines.
meanings.sent2: The bride looked stunning in her gown, truly dressed to the nines.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted around the house as if it was dressed to the nines.
meanings.sent4: The old car was restored and polished, now looking dressed to the nines.
meanings.sent5: The actor arrived at the premiere dressed to the nines, turning heads.
